TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnreferencedObjectEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the known, but unreferenced, object found in an encoded SOAP XML stream during deserialization.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about the UnreferencedObjectEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
For more information about handling events, see [Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
## Examples The following example adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>. The event is handled by the `Serializer_UnreferencedObject` method. To run the example, cut and paste the following XML into a file named UnrefObj.xml.
``` <wrapper> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" id="id1" n1:GroupName=".NET" xmlns:n1="http://www.cpandl.com"> </Group> <Vehicle id="id2" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">ABCD</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> <Vehicle id="id3" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">1234</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> </wrapper> ```
[!code-cs[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.serializati_2_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.serializati_2_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.serializati_2_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object o, string id) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique string used to identify the unreferenced object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>. The event is handled by the `Serializer_UnreferencedObject` method. To run the example, cut and paste the following XML into a file named UnrefObj.xml.
``` <wrapper> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" id="id1" n1:GroupName=".NET" xmlns:n1="http://www.cpandl.com"> </Group> <Vehicle id="id2" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">ABCD</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> <Vehicle id="id3" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">1234</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> </wrapper> ```
[!code-cs[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/38bb7a07-ca37-462e-832a-_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/38bb7a07-ca37-462e-832a-_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/38bb7a07-ca37-462e-832a-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the ID of the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the UnreferencedId property when you need to know when more than one object raises the event. The property allows you to distinguish between multiple instances of unreferenced objects.
For more information about the UnreferencedId property, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event.
## Examples The following example adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>. The event is handled by the `Serializer_UnreferencedObject` method. To run the example, cut and paste the following XML into a file named UnrefObj.xml.
``` <wrapper> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" id="id1" n1:GroupName=".NET" xmlns:n1="http://www.cpandl.com"> </Group> <Vehicle id="id2" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">ABCD</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> <Vehicle id="id3" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">1234</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> </wrapper> ```
[!code-cs[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_30_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_30_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[UnreferencedObject Event Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_30_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the deserialized, but unreferenced, object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The UnreferencedObject can be cast to the known type if examining its properties is required.
See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event for more information about the UnreferencedObject property.
## Examples The following example adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>. The event is handled by the `Serializer_UnreferencedObject` method. To run the example, cut and paste the following XML into a file named UnrefObj.xml.
``` <wrapper> <Group xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" id="id1" n1:GroupName=".NET" xmlns:n1="http://www.cpandl.com"> </Group> <Vehicle id="id2" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">ABCD</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> <Vehicle id="id3" n1:type="Vehicle" xmlns:n1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <licenseNumber xmlns:q1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" n1:type="q1:string">1234</licenseNumber> </Vehicle> </wrapper> ```
